abstract: Piraeus Bank, Greece’s fourth-biggest bank, plans to raise 800 million euros ($1.1 billion) in a sale of new shares to bolster capital, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: Piraeus Bank, Greece’s fourth-biggest bank, plans to raise 800 million euros ($1.1 billion) in a sale of new shares to bolster capital, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: Piraeus Bank, Greece’s fourth-biggest bank, plans to raise 800 million euros ($1.1 billion) in a sale of new shares to bolster capital, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: Greece’s Piraeus Aims to Raise $1.1 Billion in I.P.O.
